Description:
Location, Privacy, Opportunity!
Perfectly located in one of the Craigieburn prized locations and close to schools, shops, and transport. Be inspired by this beautiful home that would be the envy of all your family and friends.
Stylish and sophisticated it includes 3 bedrooms, Master has a full ensuite and WIR. Add to this a classy modern kitchen with 900 mm Caesar stone benches, stainless steel appliances, and dishwasher all overlooking the spacious dining, living, and a private lounge. Outside offers a double car garage with internal access to the back.
• Close to Schools
• Close to public transport
• Close to Highland shopping Centre and Highlander Hotel
• Rental return currently leasing 360 per week.
**PHOTOS ARE FOR ILLUSTRATIVE PURPOSES ONLY**
Note: This property is leased with a 1-year rental agreement and leased out for $1564 per calendar month.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Sunil Kumar 0430 487 830

Description:
Grand Residence With Dual Occupancy Potential (Subject to council approval)
With an abundance of natural light, spacious living and ample accommodation, this outstanding residence offers plenty of room for the growing family. Set in one of the Craigieburn's most popular locations and within close proximity to all the amenities Craigieburn has to offer, you will be enticed by this spacious family home set on 694m2 (approximately). Just some of the features on hand include a separate formal, well-appointed updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, meals area and a separate study area that opens out onto your oversized backyard & alfresco area perfect for those who love to entertain all year round. Additional features include master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, updated bathrooms, great sized bedrooms, ducted heating & split system cooling, car accommodation for up to 4 cars and all within close proximity to schools, parks, shops, craigieburn train station and bus stop and much more.
Insights: 13 Plumpton Avenue, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Home Sitting On 724m2!!!!
Set in a sought-after, family friendly neighborhood, just a short walking distance from Craigieburn station, parklands, schools and Craigieburn plaza, provides the ideal setting for future living with this double story home.
Offering room for the growing family, or investment, this extraordinary home has got you covered.
A large master bedroom upon entry with ceiling fan, walk through double BIR to the ensuite and access via sliding doors to a parents retreat.
Upstairs there are three generous size bedrooms all with BIRs and ceiling fans, and a central bathroom cleverly designed to allow three areas to be used at once. Don't forget the laundry chute!
With a generous sized formal living and dining area, open plan kitchen and large family/TV area, entertaining is easy. Not to mention the huge covered outdoor entertaining area. You will appreciate spending time with your family and friends for years to come.
This irresistible home also features a fire place allowing you to relax in a nice warm homely environment. Energy efficient gas appliances and ducted heating, evaporative cooling and 10 x solar panels also featured, its low cost living at its finest.
Low maintenance gardens, huge back yard and 2 generous size sheds add to the extra storage and growth potential this spacious home has to offer.
Don’t miss out on this rare and irresistible opportunity!
Insights: 29 Abercarn Avenue, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2017 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New 4 Bedroom Home !!!
This brand new well presented home is sure to impress the most astute of buyers from owner occupiers to investors alike.
The home offers spacious four bedrooms; the master bedroom has the luxury of an full ensuite and walk-in robe, while the three remaining bedrooms are fitted with built-in robes and are serviced by the central bathroom with a bath.
Into the heart of the home, you'll find the naturally light filled open plan kitchen and meals area and a separate lounge/rumpus. The kitchen provides stone bench top, quality s/s appliances and large walk in pantry. Outside is open backyard, perfect for any family occasion with enough space for your kids and pets to run around.
Conveniently located within walking distance to public transport, child care facilities, Champion Parade park, Soccer fields, Craigieburn South Secondary School will open its doors in Term 1 2020, Aitken Hill Primary School which is now open and just a short walk from Aston. Aston is located in Craigieburn, just 32 kilometres north of the Melbourne CBD and is only 16 kilometres from Melbourne Airport. Easy commute to Melbourne's CBD via the Hume Highway and Tullamarine Freeway These are just more features that will make your future brighter at Aston. Inspect this beautifully appointed home with confidence and be quick, for homes like these certainly don't last!
Call Shaun Chaudhry on 0421 429 408 to book your inspection!!
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
When location matters
INVESTORS AND FIRST HOME BUYERS ALERT !!!!
Looking for position, an investment or modern living then this property is for you!
In a fantastic location with easy access to all major ameneties directly accross the road to Craigieburn Central and Splash Aquatic Centre, public transport and so much. This immaculately presented and well maintained townhouse ideally suited first homes owners, anyone downsizing and investors alike.
With modern contemporary styling throughout this fantastic property features spacious living zone, two big bedrooms, Retreat up stairs, Master with two way bathroom, extra powder room downstairs, kitchen meals & living area all adjoining.
Features and fixtures include :
Stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops, ample bench and cupboard space, pantry, tiles throughout downstairs, split system heating and cooling, low maintenance spacious backyard with lock up car port. Currently on a Periodic lease for $1413 Per Calendar.

Description:
Fully-Optioned Family Package of Quality & Class
With its surprisingly spacious single-level floorplan, impressive list of features & outstanding Highlands convenience, this distinctive home presents an exceptional family lifestyle opportunity.
So much more than meets the eye, the home's versatile interior comprises a large master
bedroom with fitted walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes), dedicated home office with built-in workstation (potential 4th bedroom) & stylish main bathroom. Add to this a separate lounge & expansive open-plan living/dining area complemented by a beautifully-appointed kitchen complete with breakfast bar, stainless steel cooking appliances & Bosch dishwasher.
Other highlights of the home include ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm & video
intercom, ducted vacuum, integrated audio, stone benchtops throughout & double blinds all-
round, full-size laundry & excellent storage spaces, plus an al-fresco entertaining area and remote-control garage with internal entry.
Walking distance to Malcolm Creek trails & acres of parkland, Highlands Shopping Centre &
public transport, it's close to popular schools including Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar. Move in, start living!
Insights: 74 Bridgehaven Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable Modern Lifestyle of Quality & Convenience
A tree-lined street in one of Highlands' most popular pockets sets the scene for this attractive 3 bedroom family home providing a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with its generous design & quality features throughout.
Filled with natural light, the home's spotless single-level interior comprises a master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes) & stylish family bathroom. Add to this a central lounge leading through to the open-plan living/dining area & well-appointed kitchen with breakfast bar, soft-close drawers & stainless steel cooking appliances.
Ducted heating & evaporative cooling add to the appeal, along with an alarm system, ducted
vacuum & new window furnishings throughout, plus backyard including entertaining area & remote-control double garage with internal entry.
A short stroll to Malcolm Creek parkland and endless trails, public transport & Highlands
Shopping Centre, it's close to some of Craigieburn's most popular schools including Mount
Ridley College, Mother Teresa Catholic Primary School & Hume Anglican Grammar. Very impressive!
Insights: 68 Huntington Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Feature Packed Home In Prized Setting
Presented with love & pride, this impeccable home is one that will ignite your excitement. Fabulous decor, a charming colour palette & functional floor plan complements an attractive facade & manicured low-maintenance gardens.
Designed for easy living this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight the most fastidious home buyer or investor.
It's smartly configured floorplan comprises, a massive fully equipped kitchen that adjoins spacious open plan meals & a large separate family room which effortlessly links outside to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration with 2 outdoor living zones. Sleeping quarters includes 3 good sized bedrooms including a huge master with walk-in robe & ensuite, sparkling central bathroom & separate toilet.
Step outside to fire up the BBQ & enjoy the homes perfect outdoor setting which provides peace & privacy whilst you entertain all seasons. Further features include a larger than single garage, roomy laundry, ducted heating, 2 x powerful split-system cooling, ceilings fans, alarm, cafe blinds, high ceilings & so much more!
Located in a quiet and well-presented street, close to public transport, schools, parklands, Highlands shopping centre & Craigieburn Central.

Description:
WHEN ONLY THE BEST WILL DO
Sure to tick all the right boxes, from the moment you arrive you are sure to be captivated by the impressive façade and feeling of granduer you will experience here, large enough to accommodate the biggest of families but with a warmth and cosiness that's hard to get in a home of this size. Offering a lovely combination of formal and informal living zones, a versatile floor plan displayed as 4, but potentially a 6 bedroom home including formal lounge, large and well-appointed kitchen with huge stone bench tops, overlooking meals area and informal living featuring warm and rich timber floors & stacker door access to the outdoor alfresco area and back garden. Convenience of a huge master suite with w.i.r. and huge en-suite downstairs. Upstairs 3 large bedrooms (one with w.i.r. and full en-suite) central bathroom and a spacious retreat. Add a double garage,ducted heating & evaporative cooling and s/steel appliances to finish off this lovely package.
The only thing missing is you and your family

Description:
Affordable 4 Bedroom Family Home.
Room enough for the whole family in an affordable price range. Situated in a quiet street surrounded attractive homes, only a short walk to schools and lovely parklands this home is the perfect family haven. Move in and enjoy now and add decorating and finishing touches to your own taste later. Offering a versatile floor plan with 3 spacious living zones including a large formal lounge, kitchen/meals and adjacent family area with access to low maintenance back garden and internal access to double garage and a separate rumpus/theatre room. Good size bedrooms including large master suite with walk in robe and full en-suite. Only a short drive to Craigieburn Central, Splash centre and train, ideally suited to the young family on a tight budget or would make an ideal addition to your investment portfolio. Inspection is a must.

Description:
Wont Last Long!!!
Perfectly located close to public transport, schools and parklands this brand new home is the perfect first home, downsizer or an ideal investment. With everything from A-Z done for you just pick up the keys and move straight in.
This charming property showcases a well-appointed sizable kitchen possessing stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, plenty of bench space and ample cupboard space which overlooks the living and dining area.
When it comes time to rest and unwind take advantage of the master bedroom with beautiful ensuite and walk in robe, two further bedrooms with built in robes plus study or can use for kids room ideal fourth bedroom serviced by a gleaming central bathroom with bath.
Outdoors there is nothing left to do with all landscaping and concreating done for you, offering a low maintenance lifestyle.
Quality extras include ducted heating, cooling, alarm, intercom and blinds.
Take advantage of this brand new property and get the First Home Buyers Grant. Call me today on 0455 111 332 for more details.

A Modern Entertainer on 512 m2 land
Here is an excellent example of a clever design to maximize the best use of indoor & outdoor living. A quality 'Ex-Display Home' Comprising of 4 large bedrooms, main with luxurious ensuite boasting DB vanities & large WIR/dressing room, separate theatre room, gourmet kitchen features extensive Caesar stone benches with huge butler's pantry, meals area & spacious family room leading out to the stunning alfresco with outdoor sink, stainless steel benches & BBQ area. A Host of quality extras include: Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 9ft ceilings, DB garage with workshop storage area, large walk in linen area / drying room & too much more to mention. Situated in a highly prestigious and sort after location, close to all major amenities including schools, shops, transport & parklands.
This home ticks all the boxesDo yourself a favour and book your private inspection now.

Description:
Close to Park- Brand New House!!
37 Calibre Avenue , Craigieburn
(Please use iphone maps or www.whereis.com to navigate to the property)
$10,000 FHOG for eligible buyers!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria & Ray White Tarneit presents 37 Calibre Avenue, Craigieburn. Be part of a lively community at Aston where there's plenty of activity, but also the time and space to put your feet up and enjoy a quiet moment alone.
Plus Aston Estate offers plenty of opportunities for you to get out and get fit, from walking and bike trails to workout spaces at The Green.
Amenities such as schools, childcare, medical centres, public transport and council resources are also available within close proximity to Aston Estate.
Attention to detail has been given to this home from high-quality flooring throughout the house, stone bench tops, stainless steel kitchen appliances, front and rear landscaping, window treatments and more!
Features:
• 4 bedrooms with robes, including a walk-in robe to master
• LED down lights to entry, living room and kitchen
• Quality internal painting to all walls, ceiling, door frames and doors
• 20mm Caesarstone kitchen island bench top
• 900mm wide Stainless Steel kitchen appliances
• Fully fenced and landscaped
• Roller blinds to windows and sliding door
• Remote controlled double garage door
• Completed driveway, alfresco, entry and verandah
Ray White Tarneit welcomes you and looks forward to meet you at the open homes.
Call Mike Sarupria on 0430 126 491 or Frank Sarain on 0426 425 361 today to set an appointment for private inspection!!
(PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTION)

Description:
Spacious family Home in Prime Location!
This imposing double storey home's sophisticated style reflects uncompromising commitment to quality inside and out. Perfectly positioned within easy access to schools, bus services, Craigieburn Central shopping centre and gorgeous parklands and offers an abundance of space featuring magnificent solid timber parquetry floors downstairs, 2.7m high ceilings, square set cornice, 4 large bedrooms with BIR's, master with ensuite and WIR, family bathroom upstairs and a powder room downstairs, formal lounge or 5th bedroom, family room, open plan living and balcony with superb views from the master bedroom.
The spacious kitchen with 900mm S/S appliances including dishwasher is a cooks delight and looks out to the alfresco area and backyard. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, security shutters to front windows and double garage with remote access complete the home. Must be sold! Inspection will impress!
Jim Vlahos
0434 382 485

Description:
Brand New Delight!
Designed for easy living in a great location is this low maintenance residence which boasts comfort & style that will delight all home buyers.
This fantastic low maintenance Henley Home is ideal for all, with its spacious floorplan, designer flair & unbeatable location, this beautiful home showcases an abundance of natural light that includes an open plan meals/living area with a brilliantly well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 900mm oven and stone benchtops.
On offer are 3 great sized bedrooms, featuring master with walk in robe & ensuite, plus a modern central bathroom. Luxuries include ducted heating, double remote contract garage with internal access and so much more. Inspections will not disappoint!
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of this information, but it does not constitute any representation by vendor or agent.

Description:
Low Maintenance Living in the Heart of Craigieburn
More than meets the eye, this home is set to impress with its low maintenance living & instant access to all Craigieburn amenities. Whether you're a first home buyer, looking to downsize or add to your investment portfolio this is a MUST SEE!
Beyond its modern facade, this home offers 3 good size bedrooms (master with ensuite), central bathroom, well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, adjoining meals & family room boasting beautiful timber doors opening out to a private low maintenance courtyard.
Further features include:, remote garage, high ceilings, refrigerated cooling/heating, alarm system & much more.
Perfectly located close to Our Lady's Catholic Primary School, sporting facilities, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Plaza, public transport, as well as easy access to Craigieburn Road. An opportunity not to be missed. Call now!
Insights: 2/95 Dianne Avenue, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 14 other 3 bedroom unit in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable Luxury, Position Perfect
Displaying all the quality & finesse, enjoy the easy life in contemporary style with this sensational townhome located to absolute perfection. Step inside onto stunning Tasmanian Oak flooring & discover gorgeous open-plan living & dining spaces, filled with natural light from the large windows overlooking the prized rear garden.
Impressive from start to finish, the home's smartly configured floorplan comprises 3 bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe & ensuite), sparkling family bathroom & guest powder room downstairs (3rd WC). Luxurious kitchen with stone-dressed benchtops, stainless appliances including gas cooktop, ample cupboard & bench space.
Entertaining outdoors will be a breeze with the homes private low-maintenance garden, boasting high-quality artificial grass, tranquil water feature, real-life vertical garden with irrigation & a double remote (semi-enclosed) garage. It is only upon your inspection outdoors you will truly appreciate what's on offer.
With additional benefits including ducted heating, split-system cooling, study nook, hardwood timber staircase, 40mm stone-benchtops throughout, floor-to-ceiling tiles in bathrooms, high square set ceilings, downlights throughout, video intercom & much much more!
Within close proximity wetlands/walking track, playgrounds, newly developed sports grounds, kindergarten, easy access Craigieburn Central, public transport & all other important amenities.
If space, quality & location are high on your agenda, then this home needs to be on your must-see list!
Insights: 27 Honour Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
